title: Listen: James Blake’s BBC Essential Mix
content: It’s been a busy week for James Blake. As well as premiering a new track from his highly anticipated new EP, Enough Thunder, he also played a high profile slot at the infamous LA club Low End Theory. To end the week in style he spun a mix in the early hours of yesterday morning for Radio 1’s essential mix series. As well as dropping a slew of his favourite tracks, he also played some new and unreleased material of his own. The mix is well worth a listen, follow the link to stream the mix in full.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
